text: Has anyone else noticed that HubSpot CTA buttons are now being hidden by the Chrome AdBlockPlus extension? Did anything change on the HS end that might have caused these elements to get blocked?
Are there any freelance devs about? Or if anyone knows of one could you please point me in their direction.

Does anyone have knowledge around the native HubSpot EU privacy policy compliance settings? I'm trying to determine if the "allow user to opt out" mode disables only the HubSpot cookie, or will block all cookies  being used on the site (i.e. linkedin, facebook, etc). If not, I could use some code for setting up that opt out :slightly_smiling_face:

We're aware of the issue, and have reached out to AdBlockPlus to find a fix ASAP. 

cc: <@U24DCSJBE>
Awesome, thanks Jeffrey.
Do you already meet pb with CTA not shown on screen because of Adblock or Adblock Plus ?
Thanks !
I just came on here to discuss the same thing. its also blocking some js code we have running a slider
exact ! Same thing on many webistes... No more CTA because of Adblock or AdblokPlus...
this is a major issue i hope ABP is on board with fixing it as well.
<@U26BLKGE4> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U26BLKGE4/F8M58L11A/screen_shot_2018-01-02_at_10.59.07_am.png|I'm now having issues on regular AdBlock:>
yeah it is blocking that cta script and causing a bunch of scripts to fail
<@U25EHAP7G> can you confirm how it's impacting your custom slider JS?

Hi <@U24DCSJBE> - it may be that the ABP block is messing up  the JS on the page - check out our home page with ABP turned on you can see the testimonial slider is breaking ta the bottom <http://square2marketing.com|square2marketing.com>
i have someone from my team looking at it now but it seems like it might be block jquery from loading

Ah interesting, gotcha. Please do keep me posted if you identify the root of that. We're waiting on the easylist team to reply right now, but one of their team has acknowledged our request so progress is being made
yea its really jacking up homepage's that are using the HubSpot slider as well
great thanks Shay
<https://www.detectadblock.com/>

I’d suggest taking a look into this — And posting a message on sites saying “currently we have an issue with adblock plus, to get the full experience, please turn it off until we resolve the situation”
lol as you go further down the page it actually does all this for you
Any update on the AdBlock issue?
Second that :point_up:
adblock doesn’t have a reason to block the ads per their idea of what an ad that is blockable is --
but they do have the ability to block tracking — so if this is the reason it is getting blocked then this might be a bigger issue
obviously just my opinion after looking at why adblock does what they do and knowing something about HubSpot
We know about easylist blocking CTA and we are working with the list maintainers to get this solved.
<https://status.HubSpot.com/incidents/67mrmp6h4414>
The reason they are blocking all CTA's is because they found a small subset (~2 out of several million) of CTA's that are being used to serve ads. This is unrelated to HubSpot analytics
Should we be going through all our sites and reporting false positives to help this effort?
Maybe not *all* websites but a few would help so they'd get some signals that they are blocking actual content and not ads
Okay, I can do taht on some of the sites tonight
